newsitem.title: REPUBLIC OF IRELAND: Rugby union-Ireland league division one fixtures.
newsitem.headline: Rugby union-Ireland league division one fixtures.

text.p: Saturday's All-Ireland league division fixtures. All games kick-off at 1430 GMT.
Lansdowne vs Old Wesley at Lansdowne Road
St.Mary's College vs Old Belvedere at Templeville Road
Shannon vs Terenure College at Thomond Park
Ballymena vs Garryowen at Eaton Park
Cork Constitution vs Blackrock College at Temple Hill
Instonians vs Dungannon at Shane Park
Old Crescent vs Young Munster at Rosbrien
